refactor

%tr
  %td= raw("<% line1_hello %>")
  %td= raw("<% line2(world) %>")
  %td= raw("<% line3_hello %>")
  %td= raw("<% line4 %>")
  %td= raw("<% line5_(world) %>")

<tr>
  <td></td>
  <td></td>
  <td></td>
  <td></td>
  <td></td>
</tr>

Refactor this by putting the strings inside the quotes inside the <td> tags like so:

<tr>
  <td><% line1_hello %>  </td>
  <td><% line2(world) %> </td>
  <td><% line3_hello %>  </td>
  <td><% line4 %>        </td>
  <td><% line5_(world) %></td>
</tr>

Don’t yank and paste the example.

Maximum:   27 strokes
